item.title: 新西兰央行称自 3 月以来裁员近 20
item.description: 新西兰中央银行在周三公布的文件中称，自 3 月份以来，该行已裁员近 20%。【原文：New Zealand's central bank said in documents released on Wednesday that it had cut nearly 20% of its staff since March.】

item.title: 泰瑞达预计季度收入高于预期，任命新首席财务官
item.description: 泰瑞达公司（Teradyne）周二预计，由于芯片测试设备需求强劲，第四季度收入将高于华尔街预期，并任命了新的首席财务官。【原文：Teradyne on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations, banking on robust demand for its chip-testing equipment, and named a new chief financial officer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司计划在马来西亚新建稀土设施
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周三表示，将在马来西亚新建一座重稀土分离设施，耗资约 1.8 亿澳元（1.1696 亿美元），以满足市场对中国以外氧化物的强劲需求。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths said on Wednesday it would set up a new heavy rare earth separation facility in Malaysia for around A$180 million ($116.96 million) to meet strong market demand for oxides sourced outside China.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥业务部第三季度利润下降 9%，低于预期
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周二向墨西哥证券交易所提交的文件显示，其第三季度净利润下降了 9%，低于分析师的预测。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit reported on Tuesday a 9% drop in its third-quarter net profit, according to a filing with the Mexican stock exchange, landing below analysts' forecasts.】

item.title: 交易日：技术极限，再来一次
item.description: 周二，在美国大型科技公司财报和美联储政策决定公布前一天，另一波美国科技股热潮将华尔街推向新高，这一次是微软和 OpenAI 之间的交易。【原文：Another wave of U.S. tech euphoria lifted Wall Street to new highs on Tuesday, this time in the shape of a deal between Microsoft and OpenAI, a day ahead of a clutch of U.S. Big Tech earnings and the Federal Reserve's policy decision.】

item.title: 销售额增长，PPG 工业公司第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受高性能涂料和全球建筑涂料部门销售额和价格上涨的推动，全球涂料供应商 PPG 工业公司周二公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Global paint supplier PPG Industries beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by higher sales and prices in its performance coatings and global architectural coatings segments.】

item.title: 旅游需求稳定，预订控股业绩超预期，股价上涨
item.description: 在线旅行社 Booking Holdings 周二公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于更多客户在其平台上捆绑预订以及稳定的旅游需求。【原文：Online travel agent Booking Holdings beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, helped by more customers bundling their reservations on its platform and steady travel demand.】

item.title: 英伟达股票市值接近创纪录的 5 万亿美元
item.description: 周二，Nvidia（英伟达）即将成为首家市值达 5 万亿美元的公司，此前这家重量级芯片制造商表示，其人工智能处理器的预订额达 5000 亿美元，并将为美国能源部建造七台新的超级计算机。【原文：Nvidia was on the verge of becoming the first company worth $5 trillion on Tuesday after the heavyweight chipmaker said it had $500 billion in bookings for its artificial intelligence processors and that it will build seven new supercomputers for the U.S. Department of Energy.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，博雅银行对技术和电信投资银行团队的高管进行了调整
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，美国银行宣布对其全球企业和投资银行团队进行一系列高管调整，并对技术和电信部门的领导职责进行了划分。【原文：Bank of America announced a host of executive changes to its global corporate and investment banking team, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday, as it divided leadership responsibilities for technology and telecom.】

item.title: 希捷预测第二季度业绩高于预期，原因是人工智能表现强劲
item.description: 希捷科技（Seagate Technology）周二预测第二季度营收和利润将高于分析师预期，押注于云服务提供商扩大硬件投资以支持生成式人工智能（Generative AI）开发对其存储设备的强劲需求。【原文：Seagate Technology forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above analysts' estimates on Tuesday, betting on robust demand for its storage devices as cloud providers expand investments in hardware to support generative AI development.】

item.title: 交易量强劲，Visa 季度利润增长
item.description: 本周二，Visa 公布第四季度调整后利润增长，原因是强劲的消费支出促进了这家全球支付处理公司的银行卡交易量。【原文：Visa reported a rise in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Tuesday, as strong consumer spending helped the global payments processing company's card transaction volumes.】

item.title: 吉百利生产商蒙迪艾斯（Mondelez）预测，由于需求疲软，年度利润将出现更大跌幅
item.description: 本周二，蒙迪艾尔国际公司（Mondelez International）预计全年利润将出现更大幅度的下滑，原因是北美消费者减少了对其价格昂贵的巧克力和零食的购买，而主要原料可可成本的上升进一步增加了压力。【原文：Mondelez International forecast a steeper decline in annual profit on Tuesday, as consumers scaled back on purchases of its pricey chocolates and snacks in North America, while higher cost of key ingredient cocoa added further pressure.】

item.title: 人工智能产品推动罗技第二季度盈利增长
item.description: 罗技周二公布的第二季度销售额和盈利均好于预期，原因是这家电脑外设制造商售出了更多人工智能产品。【原文：Logitech on Tuesday reported better-than-expected sales and earnings for the second quarter as the computer peripherals maker sold more of its artificial intelligence-enabled products.】

item.title: 战地》制造商艺电（EA）因玩家支出不确定而未达到季度预订预期
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）周二公布的第二季度财报未达华尔街预期，受累于其核心体育产品组合支出的不确定性，以及与去年强势推出的《大学橄榄球 25》相比增长困难。【原文：Electronic Arts missed Wall Street expectations for second-quarter bookings on Tuesday, weighed down by uncertain spending on its core sports portfolio and difficult growth comparisons to a strong launch of "College Football 25" last year.】

item.title: Stellantis 与英伟达和优步合作推进机器人出租车开发
item.description: Stellantis 公司周二表示，该公司已与英伟达（Nvidia）、优步（Uber）和富士康（Foxconn）合作，探索联合开发自动驾驶汽车，旨在利用自动驾驶汽车的蓬勃需求。【原文：Stellantis said on Tuesday it has partnered with Nvidia , Uber and Foxconn to explore the joint development of autonomous vehicles, aiming to tap into the booming demand for self-driving cars.】

item.title: 梦迪尔兹公司击败了有关 Clif Bar "气候中立 "说法的绿色洗牌诉讼
item.description: 联邦法官驳回了一项集体诉讼提案，该提案指控蒙迪艾斯国际公司（Mondelez International）欺骗消费者，使其为标有 "气候中和认证 "的克里夫巧克力棒多付了钱。【原文：A federal judge dismissed a proposed class action lawsuit accusing Mondelez International of deceiving consumers into overpaying for Clif bars that were labeled "climate neutral certified."】

item.title: 礼来公司与英伟达合作开发人工智能超级计算机，以加快药物开发速度
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周二表示，该公司正在与英伟达公司（Nvidia）合作建造一台超级计算机，以帮助药物发现并缩短开发周期，从而更快地向人们提供药物。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it was collaborating with Nvidia to build a supercomputer to help with drug discovery and shorten development cycles, getting medicines to people faster.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒将进军预测市场业务
item.description: 特朗普媒体和技术集团（Trump Media and Technology Group）周二表示，将通过与 Crypto.com 合作，在其社交媒体平台 Truth Social 上推出预测市场，事件驱动型市场将继续进军主流金融领域。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group said on Tuesday it will introduce prediction markets on its social media platform Truth Social through a partnership with Crypto.com, as event-driven markets continue to make inroads into mainstream finance.】

item.title: Lucid 将推出采用 Nvidia 芯片的自动驾驶中型电动车
item.description: Lucid 集团周二表示，该公司计划明年推出一款中型四级自动驾驶电动汽车，采用英伟达（Nvidia）公司的计算机系统，这标志着该公司向在大多数情况下无需驾驶员输入即可运行的汽车迈出了一步。【原文：Lucid Group said on Tuesday it plans to launch next year a mid-size Level 4 self-driving electric vehicle using computer systems from Nvidia , marking a step toward cars that can operate without driver input in most conditions.】

item.title: 荷兰合作银行称，欧盟森林砍伐法提案令巴西出口商受挫
item.description: 荷兰合作银行（Rabobank）分析师在路透社看到的一份报告中说，欧盟委员会提出的放宽反森林砍伐法的新建议让那些为遵守规则而提前投资的巴西农业综合企业出口商感到失望。【原文：A new proposal by the European Commission to ease its anti-deforestation law has disappointed Brazilian agribusiness exporters who made early investments to comply with the rules, Rabobank analysts said in a report seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：如果马斯克因薪酬投票下台，特斯拉将考虑内部首席执行官候选人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引特斯拉董事会主席的话报道，如果埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）离职，特斯拉正在考虑内部首席执行官候选人，以防下周的年度股东大会无法通过 1 万亿美元的薪酬计划。【原文：Tesla is looking at internal CEO candidates if Elon Musk leaves in case the $1 trillion pay plan is not passed at the annual shareholder meeting next week, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing the automaker's board chair.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称委内瑞拉要求特立尼达提供埃克森油田测试详情
item.description: 据两位消息人士和路透社看到的一份文件称，委内瑞拉正在向特立尼达和多巴哥寻求有关埃克森美孚公司在加勒比海国家最近获得的一个超深水区域进行首次实地测试的地点和其他细节。【原文：Venezuela is seeking location and other details from Trinidad and Tobago about the first field tests to be conducted by Exxon Mobil in an ultra-deepwater area it was recently awarded in the Caribbean country, according to two sources and a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 沙特阿美将持有 PIF 旗下人工智能公司 HUMAIN 的少数股份
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（PIF）和阿美石油公司（Aramco）周二表示，双方签署了一份不具约束力的条款书，石油巨头将收购由PIF控股的人工智能公司HUMAIN的少数股权。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) and Aramco said on Tuesday that they signed a non-binding term sheet for the oil giant to acquire a minority stake in HUMAIN, an artificial intelligence company majority-owned by PIF.】

item.title: 智利警方突袭科德尔科矿业公司办公室，调查致命事故
item.description: 智利国有矿业公司 Codelco 周二表示，智利警方突击搜查了该公司的办公室，以收集信息，调查其旗舰企业 El Teniente 矿 7 月份发生的坍塌事故，该事故造成 6 名工人死亡。【原文：Chilean police raided the offices of state-owned miner Codelco to gather information as they investigated the July collapse at its flagship El Teniente mine which killed six workers, the company said Tuesday.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会主席称尚未决定是否取消地方电视台所有权上限
item.description: 联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）周二表示，该委员会尚未就是否取消目前的电视台所有权上限做出决定，而这是 Nexstar Media 与规模较小的竞争对手 Tegna 合并所必需的。【原文：Federal Communications Commission chair Brendan Carr said Tuesday the commission has made no decision on whether to lift the current cap on television station ownership, which is necessary for Nexstar Media to merge with smaller rival Tegna.】

item.title: ASM 国际公司第三季度预订额受中国市场拖累
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商 ASM International 周二公布的第三季度财报显示，由于来自中国芯片制造商的订单降幅超过预期，该公司第三季度预订额低于市场预期。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASM International reported third-quarter bookings below market expectations on Tuesday, hit by a larger-than-expected drop in orders from Chinese chipmakers.】

item.title: 荷兰法院给予 Meta 更多时间更改时间轴设置
item.description: 周二，荷兰一家法院要求 Meta Platforms 在今年年底前为 Facebook 和 Instagram 用户提供一种更简便的方式，让他们选择退出算法策划的时间线，即那种根据用户分析显示推荐内容的时间线。【原文：A Dutch court on Tuesday gave Meta Platforms until the end of the year to provide Facebook and Instagram users with a simpler way to opt out of algorithmically curated timelines — the kind that show recommended content based on user profiling.】

item.title: 第三季度利润超预期，Temenos上调指导价，继续物色首席执行官
item.description: 银行软件公司 Temenos 周二上调了 2025 年的业绩展望，并公布了第三季度财报，财报结果超出市场预期，同时表示将继续物色新的首席执行官人选。【原文：Banking software company Temenos raised its 2025 outlook on Tuesday and reported third quarter earnings which were ahead of market expectations while stating its search for a new chief executive continues.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 将投资 11 亿欧元扩建德国工厂
item.description: 美国芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 周二表示，公司将投资 11 亿欧元（12.8 亿美元）扩大其德国工厂的生产能力，以提高产量。【原文：U.S. chipmaker GlobalFoundries on Tuesday said it will invest 1.1 billion euros ($1.28 billion) to expand manufacturing capabilities at its German facility as it looks to increase production.】

item.title: 摩根大通洗牌高管，领导 1.5 万亿美元计划
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通已任命长期高管 Jay Horine 监管其 1.5 万亿美元的投资基金，重点关注对美国国家安全至关重要的公司。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has named long-time executive Jay Horine to oversee its $1.5 trillion investment fund focused on companies critical to U.S. national security, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】
